thread.title: rugby weekend !!!!
thread.title_full: rugby weekend !!!! - Review of Ibis Paris Defense Courbevoie, Courbevoie, France - TripAdvisor

author: lynnyNewport_
title: rugby weekend !!!!
text:
we were a group of 6 women who stayed here for 3 nights for the rugby. it's very modern, very clean and rooms a fair size. our only gripe is no tea/coffee making facilities in rooms and could do with a set of drawers. the breakfast is continental, and the same daily. on our final day, we went down to breakfast at 7, only to find they had run out of bread for toast. the bloke in charge was quite rude on many occasions, and said that everyone shouldn't eat it, then it wouldn't run out. the bar should be 24 hours, which we were told on the first night, friday 17th march. the barman was lovely, and brought us bowls of crisps, and even put on the welsh national anthem on for us and "delilah"... the following 2 nights was quite different, the barman stopped serving at 12, but on the sunday night after being told the bar was closed, he continued to serve french customers long after 12. if i was to go back to paris, i would definitely stay here again though, as it's a good price for what you get.
Room Tip: take a travel kettle and tea/coffee, although the restaurant do serve english tea, elsewhere its spe... See more room tips
